documentation.text:
@dev This function approves the idea by the randomly selected approver.
 @param id Id of the proposal to approve.

@dev This function rejects the idea by the approver.
 @param id Id of the proposal to reject.

@dev This function adds 1 vote to the proposal.
 @param id Id of the proposal to vote.

@dev This function lets the owner close the proposal after it's marked as Approved
 @param id Id of the proposal to close.

@dev This function marks the @msg.sender to be an approver and added to the list of approvers.
 @notice Approvers can't can't be voters and can't be applicants.

@dev This function marks the @msg.sender to be an voter and added to the list of voters.
 @notice Voters can't can't be approvers but can be applicants.

devdoc.author: Joseph Nicholas R. Alcantara.
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects.

applyForApprover().details: This function marks the @msg.sender to be an approver and added to the list of approvers.

applyForVoter().details: This function marks the @msg.sender to be an voter and added to the list of voters.

approve(uint256).details: This function approves the idea by the randomly selected approver.

params.id: Id of the proposal to approve.

close(uint256).details: This function lets the owner close the proposal after it's marked as Approved

params.id: Id of the proposal to close.

reject(uint256).details: This function rejects the idea by the approver.

params.id: Id of the proposal to reject.

submit(string,string,string,string).details: This function creates a new proposal.

params.description: Description or overview of the proposal.
params.title: Title of proposal.

vote(uint256).details: This function adds 1 vote to the proposal.

params.id: Id of the proposal to vote.

devdoc.title: An interface for different kinds of proposals.

applyForApprover().notice: Approvers can't can't be voters and can't be applicants.

applyForVoter().notice: Voters can't can't be approvers but can be applicants.

userdoc.notice: This contract is for educational purposes only fot the Consensys 2019-2020 bootcamp.
